com.PetKing5_480x800

Class PetKing5

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • javax.microedition.lcdui.CwaActivity
        • com.PetKing5_480x800.PetKing5

  • public class PetKing5
extends CwaActivity
    PetKing5 is an activity class that extends CwaActivity and handles various functionalities related to SMS payments and game state management. It initializes necessary components and processes payment results.

      • setSmshah

        public void setSmshah()
        Handles different SMS payment types and starts the corresponding payment activity. Depending on the SMS type, it creates an intent with payment information and starts the activity.

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                Intent data)
        Processes the result of payment activities and updates the game state accordingly.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - The request code.
        resultCode - The result code.
        data - The intent data.
